channel.title: Pre-recruiting! attention new players!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Pre-recruiting! attention new players!"

item.title: Pre-recruiting! attention new players!
item.content:encoded:
In the next days i will be founding a new village,
and i want to look for villagers,
all the new players are invited to come,
the ones who want to join answer this topic, an let your names
the when the village will be finally created i will post his name, and you could star joining

wish me luck
